title: How to Make Toaster Strudel Vanilla Glaze

steps.title: Combine all ingredients into a mixing bowl.
steps.content: Combine all ingredients into a mixing bowl.

steps.title: Whisk all ingredients together until the mixture is thick but pourable.
steps.content: Whisk all ingredients together until the mixture is thick but pourable.

steps.title: Add a few more drops of cream, if necessary, until desired consistency is reached.
steps.content: Add a few more drops of cream, if necessary, until desired consistency is reached.

steps.title: Refrigerate until it reaches a medium hard consistency.
steps.content: Refrigerate until it reaches a medium hard consistency.
